Method Detail

loadPrefs

public void loadPrefs()
Loads the preferences from the preferences yaml file.

savePrefs

public void savePrefs()
Saves the current preferences values from the prefs Map to the preferences yaml file.

setYaml

public Map<String,Object> setYaml(String yaml)
                           throws IllegalArgumentException
Adds a chunk of yaml to the preferences Map. Parses the yaml into a Map object and sets the preference values according to the map. Only changing the value of EXISTING preferences keys is allowed.

Parameters:
yaml - a String of yaml code.
Returns:
Map object containing the parsed yaml values.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If one of the yaml keys was not found in the preferences map.

printYaml

public void printYaml(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                      Map<String,Object> map)
Sends a map object as a yaml dump to the sender.

Parameters:
sender - The sender that will receive the yaml dump messages.
map - The map to dump into yaml code.

getPrefs

public Map<String,Object> getPrefs()
Returns:
a Map containing all preference keys.

findMaterial

public static org.bukkit.material.MaterialData findMaterial(String m)
                                                     throws IllegalArgumentException
Tries to find a material according to search string m. The string can be either a material name or a name and data value combination such as: wool:orange or wood:1.

Parameters:
m -
Returns:
a MaterialData that matches the search string.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - when parameter m is invalid.

registerCircuitPreference

public void registerCircuitPreference(Class circuitClass,
                                      String key,
                                      Object defaultValue)
Allows circuit libraries to register their own preferences keys. This method should be called in the CircuitIndex onRedstoneChipsEnable() method to ensure the key is added before RedstoneChips reads the preferences file. The preferences key is set in the format of class-name.key

Parameters:
circuitClass - The circuit class that uses this preference key.
key - The new preference key.
defaultValue - The preference default value.
